channel.title: CVE Feed for EditorConfig -- EditorConfig C Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EditorConfig -- EditorConfig C Core

item.title: CVE-2023-0341|2024-08-02T05:10:55.122Z -- editorconfig -- editorconfig%20c%20core
item.description: A stack buffer overflow exists in the ec_glob function of editorconfig-core-c before v0.12.6 which allowed an attacker to arbitrarily write to the stack and possibly allows remote code execution. editorconfig-core-c v0.12.6 resolved this vulnerability by bound checking all write operations over the p_pcre buffer.
